data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I choose the existing Xmms:: root namespace because it is an
    already established place for modules dealing with XMMS. The
    InfoPipe name was choosen because the module deals with the
    information the xmms-infopipe plugin supplies (and in fact, nothing
    else).

    I'd also like to suggest that the Xmms:: namespace be changed to
    XMMS:: if possible, because 1) XMMS is an acronym and should be in
    all caps and 2) XMMS is the official name of the project.
